Detailed Description

Include full API Package files Include extra exception types Schemas simplifying api calls IMPORTANT NOTE: This API uses PEAR XML_Serializer pear install "channel://pear.php.net/XML_Serializer-0.20.2"

See also:
http://pear.php.net/manual/ Entry point for SDK access. Use getService Method to retrieve the api instances
